name: Werewolf Tycoon
description:
Become the Big Bad Wolf of Werewolf Park in this stealth simulation eat-em-up.

In this business, devour the competition and consume the consumers. Wolf down as many people as you can without being seen. If too many witnesses escape things could get hairy!

Ignore reviews that say it's absolutely hilarious. Werewolf Tycoon is a TOTALLY serious, not at all tongue-in-cheek tycoon game for both casual and hardcore human-munchers.

Complete with leaderboards, cutting edge 16-bit pixel art, retro inspired soundtrack and furry bunny slippers power ups.
